title: Anagram and acrostick on His sacred Majesty, K. James II. Relating to the late triple conjuction of Saturn & Jupiter in Leo, which began in October 1682. and still continues
author: Scamler, Robert, b. 1653 or 4.
publisher: Printed byr N.T. at the entrance into Old Spring-garden near Charing-cross,
notes: Signed at end of text: Robert Scamler, M.A. &c.
Reproduction of the original at the Harvard University Library.
